title: 16 bit/ Arcade Zac
body:
most of the information is on the picture, reckon it would be worth  1350 skin
though to make it an ultimate skin riot could make it so that buying certain items changes his model a little, 
i.e. buying boots gives him boots, different colour for different type, 
{{item:3068}}  gives him a cape
{{item:3083}}  gives leather tunic
{{item:3065}}  gives iron leggings
{{item:3026}}  gives him wings and a halo
{{item:3151}}  gives him a mask
{{item:3102}} gives him a necklace
{{item:3089}} gives him a wizard hat
{{item:3116}}  gives him a white staff
{{item:3001}} gives him a purple staff

can really see what kind of build your going for based on how he looks

the items would take him out of 16 bit though, unless you could make the items 16 bit as well

replies.body:
16 bit Zac, easy profits for Rito, shouldn't be diifficult to do (afaik, rito says it's difficult to release skins).

Also, it would be cool if Zac dies, he explodes into lots of coins, like Sanic games.

> 16 bit Zac, easy profits for Rito, shouldn't be diifficult to do (afaik, rito says it's difficult to release skins).
>
>Also, it would be cool if Zac dies, he explodes into lots of coins, like Sanic games.
>
>if Zac dies, he explodes into lots of coins, like Sanic games
>lots of coins, like Sanic games
>coins
>Sanic games
>**coins**

[http://th08.deviantart.net/fs71/150/f/2014/301/5/1/get_da_rang_sanic_by_ourlordandseperior09-d84ibvc.jpg](http://th08.deviantart.net/fs71/150/f/2014/301/5/1/get_da_rang_sanic_by_ourlordandseperior09-d84ibvc.jpg)

*cough* Sorry. I just had to. I do this to anyone that accidentally says coins

That would still be a cool idea though.

yet... no one noticed he said 'Sanic'.. not Sonic -.- lol what a disgrace to classic gamers everywhere, who remember the old SEGA Genesis like me. :P
I have a Sega Genesis. And lots of people like to call him Sanic instead of Sonic.
Mm, its cool, but some parts dont fit, we've already got a jungle Arcade'er so its not good make another one, sorry! Its a cool idea!
zac can top
I think between the two, Hecarim is actually the better top.
Sometimes, when I feel that it seems fun, I play him mid lane. Works well with almost all, except that Lee Sin mid... I was powerless.
yeah he can ^^ i like it

> [{quoted}](name=thattipman,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=F2QBLqIU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-26T21:19:50.703+0000)
>
> Mm, its cool, but some parts dont fit, we've already got a jungle Arcade'er so its not good make another one, sorry! Its a cool idea!

there will always be negative people

> [{quoted}](name=AquariusGine,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=F2QBLqIU,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-27T13:32:49.739+0000)
>
> there will always be negative people

And what was the bad part? I dont dislike the skin! I didnt even say a thing about it, the passive wont fit just, but just that, lol, i dont hate, you guys want to accept everything someone says into hate, thats why the game will probably end being full only with toxic players! I said that this skin idea is cool, but it wont fit since ZAC IS FOR JUNGLE, NOT TOP, NOT MID, NOT BOT, his main is jungle. Pool Party Zac will be a great idea, this also.. but meh guys dont accept everything people say about something you like into a 'hate'! Infact the skin is amazing! :)
I like the Ultimate Skin Idea, turning him into a RPG like person. I honestly thought it was the Yellow Devil from Megaman
I IMMEDIATELY thought of this guy (and holding select to cheese him with the beam)
he was introduced 2 super smash bros wii u :D {{champion:6}} WILL RISE

Oh yea arcade zac.

Though modification according to items he bought would be bit too much, dont you think?
Yeh i figured it would be much, but it would make the skin seem less plain yellow, plus i figured this could be an alternate route for ultimate skins to take, so that they dont all have to evolve

it does not have to be plain.

If you add some color effects  when zac uses his skills. It might be actually pretty cool. 

When using ulti he could be flashing in colors of rainbow. 

Also he could go red when being attacked and light green when healing himself or begin healed by someone else.

there is a lot that could be done.
The passive revive is what makes this skin. It is clever and really awesome. +1

All of you who've commented... Yet.. this would be a cool concept, though difficult to script into the game.. plus, if they did an evolving skin for Zac, they'd have to do one for all the other champs, and no one wants to see an evolving teemo... lol.. besides... Zac just needs different colors is all.. not like you can put clothes on an polymorphous blob and expect them to stay on now.. he's like osmosis jones~! and ontop of that... to put 16bit graphics into a clearly 3d and almost-up-to-date graphical game, is astronomically difficult to make look good... Veigar has his taunt, sona's abilities, MF's shots, and hecarims abilities are particle effects... small effects that don't stay on the board long, and dont move much.. That's why they look good.. the character model and rendering is still 3d..

who says they would have to make an evolving skin for everyone else? Udyr and Ezreal each have one, and it isn't that big of a coding issue. You take this concept WAY too literally. Making him "16 bit" would be as simple as giving him a blocky monotone surface texture, not actually making his graphics in a different way. Think more creatively and not so literally.
Im on board for this lets go
If it had a big red eye, it would look like the Yellow Devil from Megaman.
Really Cool Concept, reminds me of Mega-man ^__^ If this were to ever happen, would have to be an ultimate skin if so many features were to be included i think.

I will direct anyone here who has not seen it to this post http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JGd68MaB-zac-skins?comment=0001 I want a Zac skin as much if not more than any player in the game, but his over all "stretchy" style is difficult to do anything with and doing something where buying a certain item changes his skin would take a couple of years just to perfect.
Nice Idea. If riot does this ill have a reason to buy zac
This is amazing and I hope it happens!

I dont quite know how well this would work with Zac's model is very different than most and constantly changes shape and feels stretchy/blobby while this seems pixelated and might be odd. The passive is so damn clever though, I really like this and zac could use a cool skin. The idea someone had here about him changing red when he takes champion damage, rainbow during ult and flashing green when he picks up a blob is amazing as well.
or just call it arcade and make it look normal

Would never happen.

-Insert some plain response from a red explaining how they can only makes skins for champions that already have 9 skins-

This seems like an epic idea, but the flashing colors may be too much for some of the younger players to handle. I actually just came up with an idea myself: liquid metal Zac. Silver skin with a single red eye in the center of his head, MAYBE remove the tendril. His passive will have the blobs sort of melt back into his body instead of the little explosion and the active portion can have him melt instead of explode. The Q can have his hands morph into metal blocks, the W releasing spikes in an AOE, and the ult turning him into one of those crushing blocks you can find in your everyday platformer. Not sure how his E would work, but my point is there are so many directions you can go with someone like Zac.
I also see 64 upvotes... Does that mean There will be a 64-bit Zac?
this idea is amazing! RITO PLSSSSSSSSSSS
love this idea! RITO PLZ! Give my man {{champion:154}} some looooooove
This should be made. {{champion:154}} needs a skin and this one is OP.{{item:3090}}
awesome
I love this skin. Rito Pls{{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}}
made me think of the (somewhat) recent "Splosion Man" XBLA game, and I thought that was pretty cool
Still waiting for Majin Buu Zac.
genius
The idea for the passive is amazing! Very unique and fitting to the skin concept. Definitely have my upvote!

10/10 would buy.
This is an amazing idea! zac NEEDS  new skin!
Love it!

If it can't be 16 bit, just name the skin "Shapeshifter Zac" and make his abilities rotate from different animations.

ULLLLLLLLLIMATEEEE SKIN!

Wait...

You're saying I could be that stupid boss from megaman that I spend countless hours dying to as a kid?


Sign me up!
I like the idea, perhaps it needs a little fleshing out, but I love where it could go! I encourage you to think further into the idea!
